delete_denied_has_answers: Cannot delete the question because it already has answers.
delete_denied_has_user_answers: Cannot delete the question because it has been answered by users.
delete_denied_has_test_questions: Cannot delete the question because it is assigned in a test.
update_denied_has_test_sessions: Cannot update or delete the question because a test session using it is currently in progress.
multiple_choice_min_2_active: Multiple choice questions must have at least 2 active answers.
multiple_choice_max_4_active: Multiple choice questions can have a maximum of 4 active answers.
multiple_choice_only_1_correct: Multiple choice questions must have exactly 1 correct answer.
essay_only_1_active: An essay question can have only one active answer.
essay_only_1_active_correct: An essay question can have only one correct and active answer.
essay_answer_must_not_be_empty: The correct answer must not be empty.
essay_only_1_correct: There must be only one correct answer.
